creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
if in the module the resource exists and it's a xml or a html file you will get
an  error because there is no matcher defined to get this resource. 
same problem with any resource not defined in module-resources.xmap.

Created attachment 17537
get undefined resources

added a passtrough to the mount module-resources.xmap so that the modules
sitmap.xmap gets a chance to handle this request. also moved the mount of the
modules sitemap out of the select-block in order that the modules sitmap.xmap
can handle the request whether it is static or not.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 17538
define html and xml

defines matcher for html and xml in case they exists as tested in the mounting
sitemap.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com

text: I applied the patches. Thanks a lot!
creator: andreas@apache.org
